mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GATHERING_BD (GATHERING_BD_NUM, GATHERING_BD_TITLE, GATHERING_BD_CONTENT, GATHERING_BD_STATE, GATHERING_BD_MAX_CNT, GATHERING_MAX_AGE, GATHERING_MAX_SEX, GATHERING_TYPE, GATHERING_HASHTAG, GATHERING_RATING, GATHERING_PHOTO, GATHERING_GALLERY) VALUES (#{board_num}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, #{board_category}, #{board_location}, #{board_max_cnt}, #{board_max_age}, #{board_max_age}, #{board_max_sex}, #{board_type}, #{board_hashtag}, #{board_rating} ,#{board_photo} ,#{board_gallery})
